star_rating filter plugin for Jekyll

Below are examples of how the stars should appear.
Star ImagesRatingHow this should look
0No yellow stars, five clear stars.
0.4No yellow stars, five clear stars.
0.5Half a yellow star, four clear stars.
0.6One yellow star, four clear stars.
1One yellow star, four clear stars.
1.4One yellow star, four clear stars.
1.5One and a half yellow stars, three clear stars.
1.6Two yellow stars, three clear stars.
2Two yellow stars, three clear stars.
2.5Two and a half yellow stars, two clear stars.
4.5Four and a half yellow stars, no clear stars.
5Five yellow stars, no clear stars.
